text: It looks like your ride is already in progress. You were picked up at $sys.func.FORMAT_DATE($sys.func.GET_FIELD($flow.ride, "actualPickupTime"), "h:mm a"), going from $sys.func.GET_FIELD($flow.ride, "pickupLocation") to $sys.func.GET_FIELD($flow.ride, "dropoffLocation") with an estimated drop off time of $sys.func.FORMAT_DATE($sys.func.GET_FIELD($flow.ride, "dropoffTime"), "h:mm a"). Your driver $sys.func.GET_FIELD($flow.ride, "driverName") is driving a $sys.func.GET_FIELD($flow.ride, "driverVehicle").

outputAudioText.ssml:
<speak>
It looks like your ride is already in progress. You were picked up at $sys.func.FORMAT_DATE($sys.func.GET_FIELD($flow.ride, "actualPickupTime"), "h:mm a"), going from $sys.func.GET_FIELD($flow.ride, "pickupLocation") to $sys.func.GET_FIELD($flow.ride, "dropoffLocation") with an estimated drop off time of $sys.func.FORMAT_DATE($sys.func.GET_FIELD($flow.ride, "dropoffTime"), "h:mm a"). Your driver $sys.func.GET_FIELD($flow.ride, "driverName") is driving a $sys.func.GET_FIELD($flow.ride, "driverVehicle").
</speak>
